The First Affiliated Hospital of Jilin University requires fifth-year undergraduates to do internships all year round without any holidays, and without any salary

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 4, an indiscriminate hacking incident occurred at No. 1 Middle School in Youma Town, Guiping City, Guangxi, resulting in multiple injuries, including children.
After the incident, the local public security authorities immediately began tracking down those who forwarded the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, universities all over the country have issued similar notices.
The Communist Youth League Central Committee recently launched a nationwide campaign for "Youth Learning" to "rectify formalism and reduce the burden on the grassroots."
As a result, schools have asked students to deny the existence of mandatory clock-in and screenshot submission if they receive a random check call (and in fact, we all know that most schools have these rigid requirements).

content: On July 4, the Nanchang government officially responded by denying the rumors of Jiangxi Bank’s bankruptcy, saying that the recent rights protection activities in front of Jiangxi Bank were "a small number of people suspected of disrupting the working order of the financial institution" and that the public security organs have intervened in the investigation.

On the afternoon of July 4, at Shaxi subway station in Panyu District, Guangzhou.
Because the developer’s capital chain was broken and it was unable to repay the villagers’ demolition fees but still insisted on starting construction, the villagers of Shaxi Village went to petition and complain. On the way back, some villagers were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
《2014-2024, Just 10 Years》 Elephant Commune

Ten years ago in the summer, young people were reluctant to become civil servants, and the number of people taking the national exam dropped sharply by 360,000. Hot posts said "the government pays less but the work is more".

That year, there were more than 7 million graduates nationwide, with an employment rate of over 90%. Fudan students rented yachts to hold graduation parties, and the girls spent 2,000 yuan on evening gowns and cruised the rivers and seas at night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 4, the State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television issued a notice requiring films to be registered before going abroad to participate in film festivals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 4, in Wangting Town, Xiangcheng District, Suzhou City, the government property suddenly charged parking fees for the demolished community, which caused dissatisfaction. The owners who had a conflict with the property were taken away by the police.
The owners went to the police station to demand that the people be released.
